data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: What I can see from the picture is that there are 2 people in the foreground. One of them is an adult woman who wears a black and white blouse, a pair of black pants, and a pink coat. She has fair skin and curly blond hair. She is looking to her left with a funny expression on her face. She has also got a green handbag in her right hand. The other person in the foreground looks like an adult man. He has dark skin and black hair, and he wears a black leather coat. He is walking towards the woman. I can't see from this angle what his facial expression is, but I guess he is probably looking at that woman. In the background, there are also a number of other pedestrians walking across the road via the zebra crossing. To their left, there is an old-fashioned building. It was probably built in the last century judging from its appearance. Down the ground level, there is a vitamin shop, and a huge blue poster is posted up on the glass window of the shop, saying 50 percent off, which is a fairly big sale. （196 字）
